job_description:
• Experience building data pipelines and integrating AI models with enterprise systems.
• Background in developing semantic search or predictive maintenance AI applications.
• Prior experience mentoring engineers and contributing to reusable code libraries.
• Strong communication skills for technical documentation and knowledge sharing.
• Experience with large language models (LLMs) and prompt engineering.
• Collaborate in Agile Teams: Engage with architects, product owners, and global collaborators.
• Participate in agile processes, document technical designs, and facilitate knowledge transfer for continuous delivery.
• Familiarity with secure coding practices, automated security scanning, and unit/integration testing.
